features: 【SUPER FAST PENCIL SHARPENER EVER】With strong motor, this AFMAT electric pencil sharpener can sharpen a new pencil in 5 seconds, and a used pencil in 3 seconds. If you are fed up with those pencil sharpeners which take forever to sharpen a pencil, add this colored pencil sharpener into cart. You can save a lot of time to do other work.

【LARGE PENCIL SHARPENER FOR COLORED PENCILS】If you are looking for a pencil sharpener that can sharpen your standard and large size pencils, this electric pencil sharpener will be all that you need. It can sharpen almost all 6-12mm pencils, such as No.2 pencils, colored pencils, and even hard charcoal pencils. (Not recommended for soft core pencils)

【AUTO STOP / NO OVER SHARPENING】 This electric pencil sharpener will stop sharpening automatically when the pencil is sharpened well, which really saves pencil. Th broken leads will be ejected from the blade automatically. The top open lid and large capacity shavings box make it easier to clean the shavings and never mess up your desk or floor.

【HEAVY DUTY PENCIL SHARPENER WITH 2 PENCIL NIBS】With strong and durable helical blade, this AFMAT pencil sharpener can sharpen over 8000 times. With modern design, the helical blade can be replaced easily!

【ADJUSTABLE PENCIL POINTS】 This electric sharpener has 2 sharpness settings: blunt and sharp. If you are an artist, you may need a really sharp point. If you buy this sharpener for your kids, you can adjust the setting to a blunt point.
body.description: Artist Pencil Sharpener How to Use: Plug the sharpener into a 120V outlet.Select pencil nib: blunt and sharp.Insert pencil in and press it down with little pressure. It will start to work automatically. Keep holding the pencil while sharpening. The sharpener will auto stop when the pencil is well sharpened. (No built in battery, just plug in and use; It works at full speed every second you use it.) Solution for jam of blade: If the lead is broken and jams the blade, insert a HARD pencil (e.g. a 2B pencil) and press it down with 2KG pressure. The lead will be ejected.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: No. 2 Recommended AFMAT Electric Pencil Sharpener AFMAT electric pencil sharpener is widely applicable to all 6-12mm pencils, and has no problems with your pencil shape, such as triangle pencil, oval pencil, hexagonal pencil, round pencil, etc. By virtue of the heavy-duty helical blade, this electric sharpens so fast in 3-5s, and can sharpen a host of pencils for all your students in the classroom promptly. It sharpens your pencil perfectly every time without breaking the lead and getting the blade stuck. Premium blade is super durable, and can be used up to 8000 times, surprisingly, it’s still replaceable, to serve you year after year. This could quite possibly be the last pencil sharpener you need, and by far the best, eating pencils?uneven tip?sharpening slow? You’ll never ever see! An ideal helper for teacher, students, artists, carpenters, professors, engineers, architects, and fashion designers of all ages, making drawing, writing, shading, and coloring much easier.

Why Choose This AFMAT Electric Pencil Sharpener? Wide applicability for 6-12mm pencils Rapidly sharpen in 3 to 5 seconds 8000 times life span 2 Pencil nib options: blunt and sharp Auto stop at a perfect point Top open and easy to clean Tips about cleaning shavings box: 1. Unplug the sharpener before cleaning. 2. Open the top lid by turning counterclockwise, and dump the shavings. 3. Pull out the shavings box to clean the helical blade. Artist Pencil Sharpener How to Use: Plug the sharpener into a 120V outlet.Select pencil nib: blunt and sharp.Insert pencil in and press it down with little pressure. It will start to work automatically. Keep holding the pencil while sharpening. The sharpener will auto stop when the pencil is well sharpened. (No built in battery, just plug in and use; It works at full speed every second you use it.) Solution for jam of blade: If the lead is broken and jams the blade, insert a HARD pencil (e.g. a 2B pencil) and press it down with 2KG pressure. The lead will be ejected.

For Pencils of Many Kinds All 6-12mm lead pencils, colored pencils, charcoal pencils and sketch pencils (except soft charcoal pencils) are accepted. For Pencils Varying in Shape & Size For pencils in different shape (triangle pencil, oval pencil, hexagonal pencil, round pencil), and pencils in different size (diameter ranging from 6-12mm all are fitted). Non-Slip Pads 4 non-slip rubber pads in the bottom help this electric pencil sharpener stand still when the motor works, to sharpen quietly and stay in place.

Colored Pencil Sharpener for Kids, teachers, artists, carpenters, and more Kid-Safety Design This pencil sharpener for kids auto works when coloring pencil loaded in, auto stop in the following conditions: When well sharpened(to save school pencils)When the lid opened(to protect fingers being hurt )Overheat after long run time to protect itself(Start it again after being cooled) High Efficient Teacher Supplies The electric one sharpens pencil well in seconds! Unlike battery powered pencil sharpener, this fastest pencil sharpener has no need to wait and no sudden stoppage by low battery level. Just plug in and it will work at full speed. Parent-child Fun Auto sharpening via high quality stainless steel helical blade makes much time for you to enjoy the drawing pleasure with your "little artist" together, neither manually sharpening all the time at his/her side, nor being irritated by a razor blade sharpener or a flimsy alloy blade sharpener that easily breaks off both the lead and the rotor itself, thus getting you stuck often.

Easy to Carry & Store This small electric pencil sharpener, light weight and mini size, could be a sleek desk decor, a mini gadget in your travel bag, or a ready-to-go stuff compactly kept on your counter top in office, classroom, home, or studio.

Fully Automatic Hands-Free Pencil Sharpener Long Point Pencil Sharpener Pencil Diameter 6-8 mm 6-12 mm Power Source Battery / USB USB Adjustable Sharpeness of Pencil Nib None 3 Pencil Options Degree of Automation Fully Automatic Auto Stop

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beat my expectations!
reviews.reviewText: This sharpener has been a complete game-changer. My son regularly uses colored pencils. I've always struggled to find a sharpener that can handle the softer leads without breaking them that a child can also use. This sharpener, however, has exceeded my expectations.Firstly, the auto-stop feature is a standout. It ensures that pencils are sharpened to a perfect point without over-sharpening or causing any breakage. This is particularly crucial for colored pencils, which tend to have softer leads. It even has a sharpness level selector allowing me to choose just how sharp the pencil will be when the auto-stop turns on.The speed of this sharpener is another aspect worth mentioning. It sharpens pencils incredibly fast, keeping my son happy as he completes his projects. What a time suck to manually sharpen pencils, or give up when you found 2 red pencils without a point and use orange instead.Additionally, the ease of use and cleaning is commendable. It’s very straightforward to operate, making it suitable for both adults and children (under supervision). The shavings reservoir is also a decent size, meaning I don't have to empty it constantly, and when I do, it's a quick and clean process.The build quality of the sharpener is robust, and it has a stable base, ensuring it doesn’t move around while in use. Its compact size means it doesn’t take up much space on my desk, which is always a bonus in a busy workspace.My only wish was that it worked with batteries instead of plugged into a wall, but I'm ok with this since it works so well. I've gone through so many of those cheap crap sharpeners, this one finally works!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sharpens Pencils like No Other
reviews.reviewText: This is the best electric pencil sharpener I have ever come across. Quick and easy. Sharpens pencils to a tight point in a few seconds, and then automatically stops. Has an option for a more blunt tip if you so desire. The quality seems very good. Well worth the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sharpens so fast it's fun to use
reviews.reviewText: As a kindergarten Teaching Assistant, I sharpen LOTS of pencils: #2 pencils, colored pencils, you name it. I used to wrestle with the standard school-provided sharpener, but it tended to break the pencil points as it sharpened them and leave the points uneven, with wood on one side. This sharpener never breaks points, sharpens evenly all around, stops automatically when the pencil reaches the ideal sharpness, and operates quickly and relatively quietly. The clear casing means I can see when the shavings need to be emptied. This sharpener makes my job easier, and the kids literally ask to watch it work. One of the best tools I've ever bought for my job!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect and even sharpening
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to use with perfect even sharpening. Used both Prisma and Crayola colored pencils. Works for all regular lead pencils. Fast cleanup of shavings. Tried both settings, one very sharp and pointed, one more flat. Found the flat setting to have little difference. Use minimal pressure down pressure for a dull finish.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works well at great price
reviews.reviewText: Needed a pencil sharpener because the old one I had bought from Costco stopped working. For the price, this is a great value. It sharpens quickly and accurately. It's very easy to empty the tray. No complaints.The auto-stop feature was a nice surprise and good to have if you have kids sharpening the pencils themselves. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great pencil sharpener
reviews.reviewText: I like this pencil sharpener since it is electric (sharpens faster than battery models) and being an upright sharpener, it takes up less desk space. It is easy for my 95 year old mother who loves using color pencils to make beautiful nature scenes in her Adult coloring books daily. She was making a mess with the manual and battery pencil sharpeners. When she started using this new sharpener, she sharpens dozens of colors at a time and get a nice sharp pencil tip to work on the fine details in some of her pictures.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great on Prismacolor Premier Colored Pencilss!
reviews.reviewText: I love this sharpener! After years of trying others, I decided to give this one a try. It has exceeded my hopes. The lead is not breaking and the tip is super fine. It will save me money in wasted lead from broken pencils.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: What an awesome pencil sharpener!!! It can sharpen up to 12mm pencils. It's fantastic. Easy to use and wowza! the point on the pencils is SHARP! I have been using a manual pencil sharpener- KUM brand and a Faber Castell and while those are fantastic to have- this electric one makes easy work of alllll my pencils. Wow! I tried another one called Zmol and while it was fine it didn't do the larger pencils like this one.This Afmat sharpener also doesn't eat your pencils. If it's eating your pencils you're doing something wrong. It actually has two settings- slightly blunted point and pointy point. It also has an auto stop feature. I found it's not difficult to engage this, but if I'm on the couch enjoying my evening and using my pencils- I turn this puppy slightly on it's side, tucked in between me and the couch and it absolutely does engage. It's fantastic. Absolutely fantastic. I'm glad the price finally dropped. It's worth the $22 bucks and change. It would have been harder to justify the expense at $40. I know the prices are manipulated. That's Amazon.BUY THIS SHARPENER!!!Yes- for all you coloring cultists- it DOES sharpen your crappy precious Square Brut Funers. I enjoyed testing out the sharpener on those horrible pencils.

It is really good. I purchased another Amfat earlier and it broke after 2 hours - I think I just got a dud. This one is perfect, sharpens the pencils extremely well and the hole at the top allows any thickness of pencil to be used. Nice design, easy to clean and put back together. I will be a forever customer now. It cost 1/2 what the Swordfish does and does a better job with coloured pencils. Love it.
Enfin un aiguisoir qui fonctionne bien, robuste et solide. De la magie pour mes mains.
El producto es de buena calidad, lo estoy usando hace unos días, espero tenga una larga vida

I bought several returned them. I work in different color pencils and this sharpener really does the trick with any pencil thickness. It puts an amazing point on the pencils, which is great when I need to do tight detail.

It's quick, efficient and works on all my pencils. I love that you can adjust the sharpness as I tend to break my pencil tips if they're sharpened to a fine point. It arrived quickly and was well packaged. I'm very happy with my purchase.
